title: RBI approves extension of Unity Small Finance Bank MD
description: The Reserve Bank of India has approved the re-appointment of Inderjit Camotra as managing director and chief executive officer of Unity Small Finance Bank for another two years. Unity Small Finance Bank was promoted by Centrum Financial Services with fintech company Resilient Innovations, which does business as BharatPe, as a joint investor.
